snippet.title: Woman missing from Cooktown
snippet.content: POLICE are calling for public help to locate a woman missing from the Cooktown area. Donna Steele, 42, was last seen at a caravan park in Wujal Wujal, south of Cooktown, around midday on August 2. Police and family hold concerns for her welfare as she suffers from a medical condition. Donna is described as caucasian in appearance, around 170cm tall with a proportionate build, blonde hair and blue eyes. Anyone who may have seen Donna or know her whereabouts is urged to contact Policelink on 131 444 or Crime Stoppers.
